articles.author: Cat Zakrzewski, Jacqueline Alemany, Marianne LeVine, Liz Goodwin, Colby Itkowitz
articles.title: ‘Co-president’ Elon Musk? Trump ally tests influence in spending fight - The Washington Post
articles.description: The unelected tech billionaire’s outsize role in sending the federal government careening toward a potential shutdown alarmed Democrats, academics and watchdog groups.
articles.content: Elon Musk has never been elected to office. President-elect Donald Trump has not tapped him to serve in any role inside the government. Until the July assassination attempt, he never even publicly su… [+131 chars]
